page.title: 08LIFE STYLES IN THE COUNTRY
page.content: VARIOUS FASHIONABLE PURSUITS MAY BE SEEN IN THIS RURAL AREA, AT ALL LEVELS OF SOCIETY. THE RICH LANDOWNERS ARE PREOCCUPIED WITH SHOOTING GAME - PARTICULARLY PHEASANTS WHICH THEY REAR SPECIFICALLY FOR THIS PURPOSE, CONSEQUENTLY THESE BIRDS REPRESENT A FAIRLY COMMON SIGHT. A FEW SELECT RESTAURANTS ARE SITUATED IN THE AREA AND APPEAR TO THRIVE ON THE CUSTOM ATTRACTED FROM NORTHAMPTON OR VIA THE ADJACENT MOTORWAY FROM THE GENERAL MIDLANDS AREA. BECAUSE SPRATTON IS A RATHER LARGE VILLAGE IT HAS A GREATER DIVERSITY OF PROVISION AND BOASTS A YOUTH CLUB WHERE LOCAL YOUNGSTERS MAY MEET TO LISTEN TO POP MUSIC AND DISCUSS ITS RELATIVE MERITS OR OTHERWISE. THERE IS ALSO A CONSERVATIVE CLUB WHICH IS SOCIALLY ORIENTATED AS MUCH AS POLITICAL.
